import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BiSearchAlt } from "react-icons/bi"; import OpportunityShortCard from '../Opportunity/OpportunityShortCard'; import Benefit1 from "../../Assests/Images/index/zom-in-benefit-1.png"; import Benefit2 from "../../Assests/Images/index/zom-in-benefit-2.png"; import Benefit3 from "../../Assests/Images/index/zom-in-benefit-3.png"; function Main() { const [opportunityList, setOpportunityList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/opportunity/list`) .then((response) => { setOpportunityList(response.data); }); }, []); return (

Fast and Easy Application

Easy application with a single click.

Trusted Companies

More than 70 reliable companies are hiring with us.

Virtual Interview

Attend your interview online to conform SOP.

Testimonials

"Zom-In has definitely been helpful in my search for an internship placement. They're very prompt and has constantly been updating and checking up on me. Definitely recommending them to my colleagues."
Muhammad Fakhrul Aqil - Intern
"Life is all about exploring and learning. ZOM-IN provides an opportunity for us to explore new ideas and build up connection. Opportunity is already given, keep it and move towards your goals."
Alex Chai - College Student
"ZOM-IN creates a positive impact on the students in terms of having a sense of entrepreneurship. Besides, it also encourages the students to take their first step by connecting them to the right peple. There is always a barrier between students and the working professionals, and now ZOM-IN is breaking it."
Jia Wey Tan - Researcher

Latest Jobs

{opportunityList .slice(0, 2).map((opportunityDetails, key) => { const oppoID = opportunityDetails.oppo_id; const job_type = opportunityDetails.job_type; const job_title = opportunityDetails.job_title; const company_name = opportunityDetails.companyname; const job_location = opportunityDetails.job_location; const salary_status = opportunityDetails.salary_status; const salary = opportunityDetails.salary; const partnerLink = "/partner/" + opportunityDetails.companyname.toLowerCase().trim().split(/\s+/).join('-'); const partnerLogo = "https://www.zom-in.com/images/profileimg/" + opportunityDetails.company_logo; return ( ) }) }
); } export default Main;
